statements: UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'New Title', publication_author = 'John Doe' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_date = '2022-09-30', citation_count = 50, collaborators = 'Jane Smith' WHERE publication_id = 2;

UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'New Title 1', publication_author = 'Author 1', publication_date = '2022-01-01', citation_count = 100, collaborators = 'Collaborator 1, Collaborator 2' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_author = 'New Author', citation_count = 150, publication_title = 'Updated Title', collaborators = 'New Collaborator' WHERE publication_id = 2;
UPDATE Publications SET author_name = 'John Doe' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE Citations SET citation_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE citation_id = 2;
UPDATE Publications SET title = 'New Title', author_name = 'John Doe' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE Citations SET citation_date = '2022-10-15', cited_publication_id = 5 WHERE citation_id = 3;
UPDATE Publications SET title='New Title 1', authors='Author 1' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE Collaborations SET collaborator_name='Collaborator 2', collaboration_date='2022-09-15' WHERE collaboration_id=3;
UPDATE Publications SET title = 'Updated Title', authors = 'John Doe, Jane Smith' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE Collaborations SET collaborator_name = 'Alice Brown', collaboration_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE publication_id = 2;
UPDATE publications SET title = 'New Title' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE publications SET authors = ARRAY['Author A', 'Author B'] WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE publications SET title = 'New Title 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE citations SET publication_id = 2, citing_publication_id = 3 WHERE id = 4;
UPDATE publications SET author = 'Jane Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE publications SET citation_count = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET email = 'newemail@example.com', affiliation = 'New Affiliation' WHERE id = 2;
